LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Arquebusier.label: Arquebusier
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Arquebusier.description: Standard Arquebusier model, has good precision fire capability in all ranges, it forms the backbone of any robot army.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Arquebusier.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Jaeger.label: Jaeger
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Jaeger.description: An arquebusier variant that focuses on stealth action and guerilla deployment for sabotage behind enemy lines. It has higher mobility and invisibility.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Jaeger.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Jaeger.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Jaeger.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Pioneer.label: Pioneer
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Pioneer.description: A forward reconnaissance variant of Arquebusier with improved sight sensors equipped. It has better capability in field operations, capable of hunting if needed.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Pioneer.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Pioneer.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Pioneer.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sniper.label: Sniper
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sniper.description: Having not just an improved sight sensor but also a specialized fire control system, this Arquebusier variant has the best precision long range fire among all other variants.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sniper.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sniper.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sniper.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
